name: BlocksClassic
description: BlocksClassic is a very enjoyable arcade game. A number of blocks are located on top of the field. A ball travels across the field. When a block is hit, a ball bounces back and block disappears. A ball is lost when it moves below the field. Use the paddle on the bottom of the field to prevent losing a ball. Move your mouse on the bottom of touchscreen to move the paddle. Enjoy the game!
